channel.title: Puppet Camp DC on purpleidea.com
channel.description: Recent content in Puppet Camp DC on purpleidea.com

item.title: Speaking at LISA 2013 about Puppet and GlusterFS
item.description: I’m speaking at LISA 2013, the “Large Installation System Administration” conference. This conference runs all week in Washington. I’ll be giving two talks during the week, and attending at least one BOF. My first talk is on Monday during the Gluster Community Day. I’ll be speaking about puppet-gluster, and giving a live demo. I’ll be showing some new features too. If you’d like to talk more about puppet-gluster, or want to attend the talk, give me a shout, or sign up at the above Gluster Community Day link.
